quoteText:
Your web browser may transmit a “Do Not Track” (“DNT”) signal to TripAdvisor and other websites.
Because of differences in web browsers’ default settings and the manner in which browsers incorporate DNT signals, it is sometimes unclear to site operators whether site visitors have selected the DNT setting themselves, or whether they are aware that they have a choice in determining the setting.
TripAdvisor does not currently respond to DNT signals.
title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
